info.title: Project Online
info.description: Project Online is a flexible online solution for project portfolio management (PPM) and everyday work from Microsoft. Delivered through Office 365, Project Online enables organizations to get started quickly with powerful project management capabilities to plan, prioritize, and manage projects and project portfolio investments-from almost anywhere on almost any device.

get.summary: When a new project is created
get.description: Triggers a flow whenever a new project is created.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: Root site url of your project site (Example: https://sampletenant.sharepoint.com/teams/sampleteam ).

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

get.description: Lists the projects in your project online site.

parameters.description: Root site url of your project site (Example: https://sampletenant.sharepoint.com/teams/sampleteam ).

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

post.description: Creates a new project in your project online site.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: Root site url of your project site (Example: https://sampletenant.sharepoint.com/teams/sampleteam ).

parameters.name: proj
parameters.description: The new project to create.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

get.description: Lists a project by Id in your project online site.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: Root site url of your project site (Example: https://sampletenant.sharepoint.com/teams/sampleteam ).

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique id of the project to fetch

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData select query for the columns to be returned. Example: Id, Name

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

post.description: Creates a new task in you project.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: Root site url of your project site (Example: https://sampletenant.sharepoint.com/teams/sampleteam ).

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique id of the project to add the task to.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: The new task to add to the project.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

post.description: Creates an Enterprise Resource in your Project Online site.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: Root site url of your project site (Example: https://sampletenant.sharepoint.com/teams/sampleteam ).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: The new enterprise resource to add to the project.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

get.description: Lists the published tasks in a project.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: Root site url of your project site (Example: https://sampletenant.sharepoint.com/teams/sampleteam ).

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique id of the project to fetch tasks.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. Id eq 'task-guid').

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData select query for the columns to be returned. Example: Id, Name

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

get.description: Gets the project summary task for a given project.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: Root site url of your project site (Example: https://sampletenant.sharepoint.com/teams/sampleteam ).

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique id of the project to fetch

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

post.description: Checks out an existing project in your site.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: Root site url of your project site (Example: https://sampletenant.sharepoint.com/teams/sampleteam ).

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique id of the project to checkout.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

post.description: Check in and publish an existing project in your site.

parameters.name: siteUrl
parameters.description: Root site url of your project site (Example: https://sampletenant.sharepoint.com/teams/sampleteam ).

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique id of the project to checkin.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred

TriggerProjectsWrapper.description: Project Online on new project response model.

value.description: The list of trigger projects returned.

ProjectStartDate.description: The datetime the approved project started.

ProjectFinishDate.description: The datetime the approved project finished.

ProjectCreatedDate.description: The datetime the project was created.

ProjectId.description: The unique Id of the project.

ProjectModifiedDate.description: The datetime the project was last saved.

ProjectLastPublishedDate.description: The datetime the project was last published.

ProjectPercentCompleted.description: The percentage completed of the project.

ProjectPercentWorkCompleted.description: The percentage of work completed of the project.

ProjectOvertimeCost.description: The overtime cost of the project.

ProjectOvertimeWork.description: The overtime work of the project.

TriggerResourcesWrapper.description: Project Online on new resource response model.

value.description: The list of trigger resources returned.

ResourceId.description: The unique Id of the resource.

ResourceBaseCalendar.description: The base calendar type of the resource.

ResourceCostPerUse.description: Cost per use of the resource

ResourceEarliestAvailableFrom.description: Earliest availability date of the resource

ResourceLatestAvailableTo.description: Lastest date for which the resource is available

ResourceModifiedDate.description: Last modification date of the resource

TypeDescription.description: Description for the type of resource

TriggerTasksWrapper.description: Project online on new task response model

value.description: The list of trigger tasks returned

ProjectId.description: Id of the project which the task is created in

ProjectName.description: Name of the project which the task is created in

TaskCreatedDate.description: Created date of the new task

TaskModifieddate.description: Last modified date of the new task

TaskStartDate.description: Starting date of the new task

TaskFinishDate.description: Finishing date of the new task

TaskIsActive.description: Whether the task is still active

Name.description: Name of the new project to create

Description.description: Description of the new project to create

Start.description: Start date of the new project

CheckedOutDate.description: Time which the project is checked out

CheckOutDescription.description: Description which the project is checked out with

IsCheckedOut.description: True if the project is currently checked out

ProjectLastPublishedDate.description: Last published date of the project

LastPublishedDate.description: Last published date of the project

LastSavedDate.description: Last date the project is saved

ProjectsWrapper.description: Project online list projects response model

Name.description: Name of the new task to create

Notes.description: Notes to put on the new task

Duration.description: Duration of the task. For example (1h, 2d, or 3w)

NewResource.description: A new project online server resource

Name.description: The name of the new resource to create

IsBudget.description: Is resource accounted for in the budget

IsTeam.description: Is resource part of the team

Modified.description: Time which the resource is last modified

TasksWrapper.description: Project online list tasks response model

Created.description: The created date of the task

Modified.description: The last modified date of the task

Start.description: The start date of the task

Finish.description: The finished date of the task

ScheduledStart.description: The scheduled start date of the task

ScheduledFinish.description: The scheduled finish date of the task

Priority.description: The priority level of the task

IsMilestone.description: Indicates if the task is a milestone
